thread.title: Liberals on Twitter mock Pres. Trump with the hashtag ‚Äò#SoCalledPresident‚Äô
thread.title_full: Liberals on Twitter mock Pres. Trump with the hashtag ‚Äò#SoCalledPresident‚Äô

author: Chris Enloe
title: Liberals on Twitter mock Pres. Trump with the hashtag ‚Äò#SoCalledPresident‚Äô
text:
President Donald Trump took to his favorite social media platform early Saturday to chastise the federal judge who ordered a nationwide halt of his recent executive order on immigration and refugees. 
Writing on Twitter, Trump labeled that judge ‚Äî Seattle-based federal district court Judge James Robart ‚Äî a ‚Äúso-called judge.‚Äù 
‚ÄúSo-called‚Äù is a label Trump often gives people who oppose him or disagree with him. 
But now Democrats and liberals on Twitter are hitting back at the president, turning the tide on Trump and tweeting reasons why Trump is merely a ‚ÄúSoCalledPresident.‚Äù So-called President with lowest approval ratings & IQ will have one of the shortest presidency in US history. #SoCalledPresident 
‚Äî Alexander L. King (@1101LittleOne) February 4, 2017 #SoCalledPresident wants you to believe he's making üá∫üá∏ great while he removes freedom, destroys the environment and prioritizes the banks. 
‚Äî Tommy Campbell (@MrTommyCampbell) February 4, 2017 Remember when a KGB agent helping an American win national office would be the subject of Congressional Investigations? #SoCalledPresident 
‚Äî Emanuel Zbeda (@therealezway) February 4, 2017 Our #socalledpresident is an everyday conman. He's unfit, unqualified and unstable. pic.twitter.com/tJP3beCKae 
‚Äî MelissaC #DemForce (@Melacook0515) February 4, 2017 I will, from here in out, refer to the orange one as the #SoCalledPresident https://t.co/ApVZ3wdHCz 
‚Äî Not My President (@N_4_B) February 4, 2017 This #socalledpresident is a stain on the fabric of America, shaming religions, countries, and even its own citizens. #Fraud #Sad #Trump 
‚Äî Rachel Bazinet (@RachelBaz) February 4, 2017 #SoCalledPresident panders to his racist base by refusing to condemn attack on Muslims by white Christian terrorist. #DividedStatesofAmerica https://t.co/mTUMIt5v75 
‚Äî Richard A. McGough (@RichardMcGough) February 4, 2017 He's trying to delegitimize the Courts just like he did w/ the media. Straight out of Fascism Playbook. Our #SoCalledPresident = dictator. 
‚Äî Michael Kasdan (@michaelkasdan) February 4, 2017 
Even a congressman, Rep. Ted Lieu (D-Calif.), joined in by mocking Trump as the ‚Äúso-called president.‚Äù Pleased that this #saturdaymorning , @DHSgov will follow the Constitution rather than our So-called President. https://t.co/aZCHPQT20R 
‚Äî Ted Lieu (@tedlieu) February 4, 2017 Uh-oh, even @realDonaldTrump can't figure out how to defend his crazy actions. He's now just shouting campaign slogans. #SoCalledPresident https://t.co/MaBvaXrAcS 
‚Äî Ted Lieu (@tedlieu) February 4, 2017 
Trump has not responded to the hashtag on Twitter, although he did write on the social media platform Saturday afternoon lamenting over the effects that Robart‚Äôs ruling might have on U.S. national security. Rate this story
